item.title: House GOP resolution would overturn Biden's gas water heater ban
item.description: Rep. Gary Palmer of Alabama introduced a resolution to overturn President Biden's recent ban on natural gas-fired water heaters by 2029.

item.title: President Biden set to deliver farewell speech to the nation
item.description: President Biden is set to deliver his farewell address to the nation on Wednesday at 8 p.m. ahead of President-elect Trump's inauguration.

item.title: Majority say Biden will be remembered poorly as president says farewell to the nation: poll
